title: The Nothic's Lair
summary: A new ally arrived—Aster, an 8-foot-tall Giff druid who smells of ozone and crushed herbs. The party immediately gaslit the recovering Belden into thinking Aster wasn't real, coordinating an elaborate prank that even included Larry. After learning about the Redbrand hideout under Tresendar Manor, they rallied the townsfolk, recruited Darren Edermath, and entered via a secret tunnel. Deep inside, a Nothic's psychic claws scraped at Semaj's mind. The session ended with the aberration casting Rotting Gaze as initiative was rolled.

best_moments.title: Aster Joins the Party
best_moments.description: A massive Giff—8 feet tall, 580 pounds, hippo-person druid—walked up to the party. Semaj immediately recognized him as a fellow astral being and they spoke in Celestial.

quotes.speaker: Alan/Aster
quotes.text: He's a Giff. He's a lawful good, about 8 feet tall, 580 pounds, hippo person, basically.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: He walks like someone who has marched through wars. And possibly started a few.

quotes.speaker: Alan/Aster
quotes.text: His tusks are carved with symbols in celestial and druidic. And he smells of ozone and crushed herbs.

best_moments.title: Gaslighting Belden
best_moments.description: The entire party coordinated to convince the recovering Belden that Aster wasn't real. Even Larry joined in, looking right through Aster when asked.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: Who the hell are you? You weren't here last night. Or did I just dream this hippo is here?

quotes.speaker: Alan/Aster
quotes.text: Aster is going to play along and gaslight him into thinking he is not there.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: Either I'm dead or I'm still drunk. What is going on?

best_moments.title: Larry Joins the Prank
best_moments.description: Aster cast Speak with Animals and told Larry to pretend he wasn't there. Larry walked to Belden, whined, and looked right through Aster.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Larry rises to all four and without as much as a glance at you, Aster, he's going to walk to Belden's side and he's going to whine.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: And Larry poignantly looks through Aster. The rest of the party is probably struggling to contain your laughter at this point.

best_moments.title: Rallying the Townsfolk
best_moments.description: Semaj gave a speech in the town square, calling for people to stop standing alone. Darren Edermath, a retired adventurer, stepped forward to join them.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Let's remind these Redbrands what happens when good people stop standing alone.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: And then from the crowd, this older man with silver hair, an elf, he steps forward. His clasp bearing the symbol of Tymora.

best_moments.title: The Halfling Boy's Secret
best_moments.description: A young halfling boy named Carp revealed he had followed Redbrands to a secret tunnel entrance behind the manor.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: There's a cave, a tunnel behind the trees at the edge of the manor. I followed some Redbrands when they thought no one was watching. It's a secret entrance in the hillside.

best_moments.title: The Nothic Attacks
best_moments.description: Deep in the hideout, a Nothic's psychic claws scraped at Semaj's mind. When Semaj resisted, the aberration cast Rotting Gaze. Session ended on a cliffhanger.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You begin to feel something scraping at the edge of your consciousness. Almost like spectral claws are trying to peel away the folds of your thoughts.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Nothic)
quotes.text: You taste different. Magic in your blood. Pain in your past. I wonder what I would see if I peeled it back.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Let us dance. And he is going to cast Rotting Gaze on you.

best_moments.title: Aster Eats Everything
best_moments.description: Being a giant hippo, Aster consumed massive amounts of food at breakfast, eating an entire loaf of bread in one sitting.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You just eat the entire loaf of bread in like one sitting. It's gone in seconds.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Grista mutters to herself: I'm going to need to kill another pig.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Either I'm dead or I'm still drunk. What is going on?

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Nothic)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: You taste different. Magic in your blood. Pain in your past.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Grista mutters: I'm going to need to kill another pig.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Let's remind these Redbrands what happens when good people stop standing alone.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: It's the ghost of hippo past!

character_spotlights.moment: Joined the party! An 8-foot Giff druid. Immediately participated in gaslighting Belden.
Resisted the Nothic's psychic probe, recognized it as an aberration, warned the party
character_spotlights.one_liner: This is not gonna go the way you think it is.

character_spotlights.moment: Participated in the prank, looking right through Aster when told to pretend he wasn't there
Woke up from near-death, got gaslit by the entire party about a hippo
character_spotlights.one_liner: Either I'm dead or I'm still drunk.

plot_developments: Learned about Tresendar Manor hideout from Grista
Carp the halfling boy revealed secret tunnel entrance
Entered Redbrand hideout via secret tunnel

npcs_encountered.name: Darren Edermath
npcs_encountered.notes: Pledged sword to help the party

npcs_encountered.name: Grista
npcs_encountered.notes: Provided lodging and information about Redbrands

end_state.cliffhanger: Nothic just cast Rotting Gaze on Semaj
end_state.next_objective: Defeat the Nothic, explore the hideout
